title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 51.4 - Adjournment
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 51.4 - Adjournment

State Regulations
A request for an adjournment of the hearing should be in writing and submitted to the hearing officer and other parties prior to the hearing. Adjournments shall be granted only by the hearing officer, and only after the hearing officer has consulted with both parties. When granted, adjournments should be to a specified time, day and place. Notes

51.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
